title: Silent Sam
author: Silent Sam
created_time: December 25, 2022, 03:20:03 PMLast edit: December 26, 2022, 09:27:31 AM by Silent Sam
content: THE WORLD'S MOST EFFICIENT CROSS-CHAIN INVESTMENT BRIDGE             AIRDROPTERMS AND CONDITIONS1. Join Thermo Finance Telegram Group2. Bounty Manager and Team have the right to make changes to the provisions at any time.3. Every Twitter, Tiktok, and Video participant obligatory to report their work on the form provided.4. Participant is forbidden to duplicate other people's works.5. By agreeing to participate in this bounty, you acknowledge that the wallet address you submitted is final and can't be changed.6. Bounty program organizers can't assure the project's success as our duty is to provide a bounty management service for them as freelancers, We are responsible only for managing the campaign. 7. We are not responsible for the project's success and continuity.8. Participating in this bounty campaign or investing in it will be at your own risk.9. Talking about the bounty in the project chat group will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign and an instant ban from the company chat group. 10. KYC is not required for the bounty campaign. However, the project's team has the right to require KYC for suspicious cases.11. Please note that any offensive or inappropriate behavior will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign.12. Using multiple accounts, cheating, and spamming are not allowed.Proof Of Registration Post Format:Code:#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Telegram Username:Participated Campaigns:Polygon Wallet Address: BOUNTY ALLOCATIONFacebook : 15%Twitter: 20%Youtube/Tiktok: 25 %Telegram : 10%Signature: 30%Total Budget 2 Million TOT Token=========================================BOUNTY DURATIONBounty Program will last for 2 MonthsWEEK 1 (25.12) - (01-01)SPREADSHEETRewards:● 300 - 1000 Friends + Followers: 1 stake, per one post or repost or comment● 1001 - 3000 Friends + Followers: 2 stakes, per one post or repost or comment● 3001 - 6000 Friends + Followers: 3 stakes, per one post or repost or comment● 6001 - 12000 Friends + Followers: 4 stakes per one post or repost or comment● 12001+ Followers: 5 stakes per one post or repost or commentRules:● Must have at least 300 friends and make privacy settings open for your page.● Follow and like the official Facebook account ● Make 1 post and 1 repost per day.● Like a post when you make a share.● Post must contain text 70+ characters, and hashtag:  #thermo #thermofinance #tot ● Multiple account registrations are not allowed, all related accounts will be checked anddeleted.● Please, post all the links to your work in this thread every 3 days as a new post. Do not quote or edit your previous report.How to join:1. Fill out the registration form here:  Rewards:  1. Have more than 501 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 1501 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5001 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,001 followers: 4 stakes/weekRules:  1. Every participant must follow Thermo Finance Twitter Page.2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 501 followers.3. Participants have to make new tweets or retweet 6 tweets per week (maximum 1 retweet/day).4. Time gap between 2 retweets/tweets needs to be 10 hours minimum.5. Participants must use #thermo #thermofinance #tot@TokenThermo in every retweet or tweet.How to join:Join Thermo Finance official Telegram Group,  Discord and Twitter.Fill out the registration form here:  Rewards:5 stakes/weekRules:1. Join Thermo Finance official Telegram Group.2. Your telegram username must be visible to all while in the community. You must interact with the Telegram account with which you have registered the campaign. Violation of this rule will lead to the removal of all earned stakes.3. Participants have to interact with each other on the Thermo Finance Telegram Group.4. Participants have to write 5 constructive messages to each other per week. (maximum 1 retweet/day)5. Time gap between 2 messages needs to be 10 hours minimum.6. Meaningless, irrelevant messages or copying and pasting messages by changing the project name are not counted, tryto help other users by providing the correct information regarding the project. Either you can ask questions or help others with proper answers regarding the project.How to join:Join Thermo Finance official Telegram Group,  Discord and Twitter. Rewards: Jr Member: 15 Stakes/WeeksMember: 20 Stakes/WeekFull Member: 30 Stakes/WeekSr Member: 50 Stakes/WeekHero and Legendary: 80 Stakes/WeekFull Member and Up will be Rewarded with 5 Additional Stakes for Wearing AvatarRules:   1. Avatar and Signature need to be used till the end of the campaign.2. Posts made on micro earnings, archival, bounty threads and off-topic willbe excluded. Max of 4 posts in local boards will be counted towards your quota per week.3. Posts with less than 100 characters will not be counted as valid posts.4. Please make a minimum of 10 constructive posts weekly.5. Posts should be spread evenly across 4 days at least.6. Any kind of spam is not allowed.7. Bounty reports are not counted.8. Forum rank can not be updated after the registration.You can't modify or upgrade your rank once registered on the campaign.How to join:Join Thermo Finance official Telegram Group,  Discord and
